entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump What is wrong with this administration? Doesn't anyone care that the lies and deception coming out of the White House are KILLING people? Is the economy and winning an election so important that it is prioritized ahead of human life? #TrumpLiesPeopleDie
